actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: Congratulating the on-premises sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses on the occasion of its 62nd Annual International Sign Expo.

summary.text: Congratulates the members of the on-premises sign and sign products industry on their 62nd Annual International Sign Expo and encourages the on-premises sign industry to continue events such as the Expo to educate the small business community and the general public about the benefits of effective signage.

titles.title: Congratulating the on-premises sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses on the occasion of its 62nd Annual International Sign Expo.
